'''Measure Is Unceasing''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Ash and Ore]] on the island of [[Iron Bay]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Don't attack any of the 4 Commissarius that are scrutinizing cursed objects.</big>
